titles.title: Lord We’ve Come Into Your House Tonight

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord we’ve come into Your house tonight None or us is worthy, none is right Take a hold or our wandering hearts There is no other place to start What we need, only You can bring Meet us as we sing{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We’ve come to praise You, We’ve come to praise You You are God, You are God You are Holy/Worthy, You are Holy/Worthy We’ve come to praise You, Praise you{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The bride of Christ is in this house tonight She’s holy and she’s radiant as Christ There is no other one like her She’s the treasure of His heart What He needs only she can bring Join her as she sings{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}As we gather in Your name tonight We assemble Your Son, Jesus Christ What’s invisible now is seen, it’s no longer a mystery We are called to know Jesus Christ As one body{/lang-eng}
